Html: We are building application based on CAB using SCSF May 2007(20 views). We are planning to upgrade application to use WPF using SCSF Contrib. I know its still very very early to use Prism but we have release date of September 1 and we have plans to revive our application in May end. Any thought if we shuold wait for Prism to release? Is there going to be migration Path?
